channel.title: Actions and Filters on Piklist Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Actions and Filters on Piklist Documentation

item.title: piklist/add-ons/after_including_all
item.description: This hook will be depreciated in a future version of Piklist. Replaced by [‘piklist/add-ons/after_including_all] (actions-filters/) Runs after a Piklist add-on is activated. do_action('piklist_activate_add_on'); Class class-piklist-add-on.php

item.title: piklist_parts_process-{$folder}
item.description: do_action("piklist_parts_process-{$folder}"); Class class-piklist.php Arguments $folder The parts folder where the file is located ( e.g. meta-boxes, notices, terms, users, etc.).

item.title: piklist_parts_processed-{$folder}
item.description: do_action("piklist_parts_processed-{$folder}"); Class class-piklist.php Arguments $folder The parts folder where the file is located ( e.g. meta-boxes, notices, terms, users, etc.).
